mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT G.*, D.FILE_NAME AS goodsFileName FROM T_SHOPPING_GOODS G INNER JOIN T_GOODS_DETAIL_IMAGE D ON G.GOODS_ID = D.GOODS_ID AND D.FILE_TYPE = 'main_image' AND G.GOODS_STATUS = #{goodsStatus} ORDER BY G.GOODS_CREDATE DESC) T WHERE ROWNUM < 16

SELECT G.*, D.FILE_NAME AS goodsFileName FROM T_SHOPPING_GOODS G INNER JOIN T_GOODS_DETAIL_IMAGE D ON G.GOODS_ID = D.GOODS_ID AND D.FILE_TYPE = 'main_image' AND G.GOODS_ID = #{goodsId} ORDER BY G.GOODS_ID
SELECT * FROM T_GOODS_DETAIL_IMAGE WHERE FILE_TYPE != 'main_image' AND GOODS_ID = #{goodsId}

SELECT G.*, D.FILE_NAME AS goodsFileName FROM T_SHOPPING_GOODS G INNER JOIN T_GOODS_DETAIL_IMAGE D ON G.GOODS_ID = D.GOODS_ID AND D.FILE_TYPE = 'main_image' AND G.GOODS_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{searchWord} || '%' ORDER BY G.GOODS_CREDATE DESC
SELECT GOODS_TITLE FROM T_SHOPPING_GOODS WHERE GOODS_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY GOODS_CREDATE DESC
